title: Will the alarm on my phone still work if it is set before my battery dies? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess so, if there is still battery by the time the alarm goes off. Just charge the battery otherwise the phone might run out of battery before the alarm goes off and you'll miss your alarm. I suggest if you want to make the battery last longer throughout the night, TURN ON airplane mode.. this will stop all wireless connections and it'll save battery… And additionally, turn on battery saver mode. The alarm will always go of even if battery saver mode is on and airplane mode is turned on.

Well not if the battery dies before the alarm goes off. But most phone alarms will go off as soon as the phone is powered back on adter charging to let you know. This is why your better to invest in a cheap alarm clock or even and old retro wind up clock.
